name: Marco Polo Bridge Incident
description: The game begins on July 7, 1937. You can choose either of the two major forces located in Nanjing and Yan'an at that time, or operate the regular army to fight frontally, or develop guerrillas to attack the enemy's rear and save the precarious country!

name: Eat Bananas
description: Eat Bananas is a puzzle game that requires the use of notepad and search engines. Help Dr. Cow to complete strange experiments and discover the truth behind it!

name: The Savage Hypnotist's Puppets
description: The girls are deprived of their freedom by hypnosis and their hearts are about to be shattered. Is it possible to escape from this daily life that has turned into hell?

name: Chronicles of Refugia
description: In the aftermath of catastrophic global warming, humans live in conflict with their new, not-so-human neighbors... and three "Alices" must fight against humanity to ensure the survival of their race.

name: EmagineWorld
description: In this game, you can freely switch the size of the voxel, and the player's perspective can also be converted synchronously. Pyramid voxels allow you to build buildings with angled angles. By slicing voxels into smaller sized voxels, you can create rich details for buildings.

name: Zoo Chess
description: Game based on chess where each piece on the board has its unique ability. You can play against the A.I or with your friends online

name: Zombies TD
description: A tower defense game mixed with a little luck. A horde of angry zombies is approaching, bombs have been placed but they will only explode in ten minutes, until then you need to defend the objective with what you have and what you have.

name: Wolfstar Adventures in the Inu System
description: A sci-fi action-adventure platformer. Travel the Inu System and talk to a colorful cast of NPCs across various worlds. Explore maze-like levels by running, double jumping, and dashing. Fight off various robotic enemies using special melee attacks, and eventually take down the boss of each dungeon.

name: Wega: Lost in the Outer Reaches
description: Sci-fi survival game inspired by Subnautica and Star Wars. Drive speeder bike, collect resources, craft and explore an alien word.

name: Trainz Plus: QR National GE C44aci
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including these versions by Queensland Rail National (QRN). This pack features the 5000 and 6000 class QRN locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: QR National GE C44aci
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including these versions by Queensland Rail National (QRN). This pack features the 5000 and 6000 class QRN locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: QR National GE C44aci
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including these versions by Queensland Rail National (QRN). This pack features the 5000 and 6000 class QRN locos.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Nezuko Advanced Demon Form
description: Nezuko Kamado (Advanced Demon Form) will become a playable character.

name: Top Dog
description: Dogfight your way through short, intense and randomized runs. Hard but easy to pickup, with daily leaderboards and minimum hardware requirements

name: Transmissions
description: Jump, Swing and Explore your way through beautiful environments and exciting challenges.

name: Tribe Explorer
description: TribeExplorer Is an Retro style 2D Platformer. Play as the Tribe Explorer and try to beat all the different levels littered with sweet platforming, enemies, gravity puzzles and more!

name: Unreal Vendetta
description: You are a successful thief who periodically makes forays into various dungeons in search of treasures and wealth! Every outing you play with death, because the dungeons are full of traps and monsters that are ready to destroy you!

name: Utter Inverse
description: Something wicked enters our Dynast's high demesne. UTTER INVERSE - an RPG about the meeting of two points. Salt on your tongue : as the night sky crackles : the SWORD hums in your hands.

name: Wayward Shadows
description: Wayward Shadows is a rogue-lite monster hunting RPG with turn-based battles. Travel the United States of the 1980s and solve mysterious murders to earn experience, gather equipment, and level up. Build your custom team of hunters and find the best strategy to defeat evil and save the world.

name: The Pit
description: A flashy, fast paced, third person action roguelike filled with exciting characters, biblically accurate enemies, fully procedural environments and build customization to fit your play-style and become an unstoppable god.

name: The Trasamire Campaigns
description: The King is dead. The war for his Kingdom has begun. Take on the mantle of one of Trasamire's legendary founders and explore the story of their bid for the throne in this colorful strategy puzzler.

name: Thrice in a row: Last Adventure
description: The final part of a great game Available 28 completely new levels. Thrice in a row is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses.

name: Tokyo Underground Killer
description: Dive into the neon-drenched deep underground of Tokyo as Kobayashi, a deadly assassin who harnesses the power of blood energy. Use your sword, mystical abilities and powerful weapons to assassinate highly dangerous maniacs and stop the invasion of the brutal Flatliners terrorizing Tokyo.

name: The Monstrous Horror Show
description: In an abandoned hospital, four young girls gathered here for their own reasons and began to explore the hidden secrets of the hospital. Can they escape safely and return to their normal peaceful daily life again?

name: The Last Premiere
description: The Last Premiere is a 3D action adventure, in which you use your sword, hammer, wing capes and wits to solve the mysterious deaths of a troupe of actors in the 1930s.

name: The Devil Within: Satgat
description: The Devil Within: Satgat is a 2.5D stylish action adventure that follows the journey of an Eastern warrior infected with demonic blood. Dig into the secrets of a ruined world while taking down enemies in stylish action sequences.

name: The Hunter's Journals: Wight Chapel Dreams
description: Revisit the case which made you a legend among your peers.

name: The Kraken Wakes
description: Featuring ground-breaking interactive voice technology. Speak to the characters and receive responses in real-time to change the story, as you experience an alien attack on the oceans of Planet Earth. The exclusive interactive adaptation of John Wyndham's epic scifi/horror novel, The Kraken Wakes.

name: Aero Striker: World Invasion
description: Aero Striker is a highly stylized action-packed flight combat simulator game that is intentionally designed to be easy to make it more enjoyable and less nerve-racking. The aim is to have fun making aliens explode while experiencing the sensation of flying. Let none of the evil aliens escape!

name: Aery: Path of Corruption
description: You play as a bird-like spirit and fly through the different scenarios of the decision-making process of the protagonist. Each level represents a different path that the protagonist could take. Discover the different paths, find their possible outcomes, and find a good future for your new friend.

name: Age of Dynasty
description: Age of Dynasty is an open-world survival game that spans from the end of the Stone Age to the future

name: Age of Irata
description: A retro styled sci-fi metroidvania without the technical limitations. Dash, jump, roll, swing, and shoot your way back through 5 planets in this open styled exploration adventure in all of its pixel art glory!

name: A Hero's Quest pt1
description: A Hero's Quest pt 1 Fulfill the role of a Hero and join this cast of misfits in stopping evil and saving the world, but what will happen to them. Will they save the world or will they be stopped?

name: A.I.T.W
description: Play a light FPS with little story up to 4 hours & collect items, cool weapons or see The merchant, use your ability's & grapple hook to destroy your foes and reach high areas, stop a cybernetic army and other enemy factions, play 4 onslaught maps.

name: Among Ass: Trilogy
description: Local party or single player game about teamwork and killing with forbidden items!

name: Asterogues
description: Beat up planets in Asterogues, a cosmic bullet hell shoot-em-up hybrid! Pick your character from a band of outcasts banished to the Asteroid Belt, dodge and shoot your way through a brutal onslaught of bullets, and take revenge against the Solar System!

name: Dark Atlas: Infernum
description: If Hell is a state of the soul, this story is the descent to the inner abyss. Atlas Negro: Infernum is a disturbing first-person story , where the end of the world is combined with psychological terror in a survival horror experience with a strong narrative component.

name: Attack of the Trafalas
description: A long time ago in a small island, an organization of evil robots have taken over, with the mission of corrupting and exterminating mankind, until a few decided to resist.

name: Axis Football 2023
description: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

name: BackRooms New
description: This game is "BackRoomsNew" in game, after each level the game will be harder and in each level there will be all kinds of monsters that will try to catch you. Each level will have a task where you have to find a key or a lever and all sorts of things to open the door.

name: Bargin to Win
description: BarginToWin is trade bargain simulation game that you buy cheap and sell for profit!

name: Bartox
description: In this musical adventure game, you'll follow Bart as he realizes his new violin is magical and transports him to a fantasy world, away from his monotonous life. Solve the puzzles and learn about the mysteries within. Oh, and a lush voice is narrating his every move..

name: Nekomancy
description: Nekomancy is a Magic rougelite looter shooter! Craft spells and vanquish evil creatures! Grab their loot and craft better spells! Make progress in the skill tree! Only the best synergies pass the test!

name: Ninja Thea
description: Casual 2D platformer with a cute ninja girl theme.

name: Obedient Servant
description: Servant of the king or hero of the Mediterranean kingdom? What happens if an ordinary servant who cannot hold a sword decides to be promoted to the knights or even the royal guard?

name: Odin's Ring
description: Odin's Ring is a game based on the 9 worlds of Norse mythology. This isometric style will contain a fusion of popular JPRG and MOBA game mechanics.

name: Order Automatica
description: A turn-based auto battler secret society. Draft your grid of allies, arrange them in synergistic formations, equip items to gain power, and survive against a gauntlet of enemy grids. Perform the rites and ascend with a variety of different team builds to unlock new allies and powerups!

name: Paper Nebula
description: Paper Nebula is a fast paced, arcade style scroller, reinvented as a Roguelike! This space shooter will have you blasting through endless waves of alien ships, to escape the Paper Nebula. With adorable paper style graphics and intense gameplay, you wouldn't want to be trapped anywhere else.

name: Party Chaos
description: Fun party game where you can Play minigames with your Friend or against your friends.

name: My Furry Protogen: 18+ Adult Only Patch
description: New additional scenes as a part of the culmination of romanceable character storylines.

name: Morris Cave
description: Help Morris find the way out of this cave as quickly as possible. Every level, a new challenge! Defeat the monsters and don't get caught by the traps hidden in the darkness.

name: My Dear Sister
description: My Dear Sister is a first-person story-driven mystery-horror game with puzzles and exploration experience. The game focuses on the secrets of Fellows Family and the story of twin sisters Alice and Astrid.

name: My First Femboy Date
description: You've matched with a cute femboy on an app. The date is set and you meet him at the amusement park.

name: Spellshaper
description: Fast paced roguelike with a heavy focus on spell crafting, that takes place in a random generated world, where you have to find and kill powerful bosses to defeat the darkness.

name: Space
description: Space is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told the story of two lesbians who are absolutely alone on a spaceship. Because of this, they fall in love with each other... The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance.

name: Soul King
description: Reach out and connect. Fight through tight retro FPS levels to free dreamers from captivity. Build your army of free people until you're powerful enough to take on the Soul King itself.

name: Sky Captain's Return
description: Inspired by the classics "Future Cop L.A.P.D" and "Herzog Zwei" in Sky Captain's Return, you play as a strong mecha warrior to conquer the enemy base with your units. Defeat the legendary Sky Captain in single-player mode or compete against your friends or random players.

name: Sippin Hot Blickety Block N Bop Those Bad Battle Boys Down to Size Supreme
description: Hop and bop your way to victory against a wild parade of killer blocks in this endless runner!

name: Sins From Magdala
description: Enjoy this puzzle game in first person, escape room style, in which you will have to discover 7 enigmas that are hidden behind the "controversial" biblical figure of Mary Magdalene.

name: Shukuchi Ninja
description: Shukuchi Ninja is a fast-paced, high intensity arcade game with unique controls

name: Shocked
description: Control electricity in this inFAMOUS-inspired game!

name: Sex Adventures: The Pool Party
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a young couple experiencing their first sex party together at a very exclusive pool.

name: Search 4 Bigfoot
description: It's a dark night in the forest, and something is lurking just beyond the trees. Can you find Bigfoot before he finds you?

name: Samurai of Hyuga Book 5: Side Stories 11-20
description: A collection of the second ten short stories in the world of Hyuga, featuring your favorite characters! A total of over 63,000 words!

name: Saber Ship
description: Travel through the spatio-temporal tunnel with your ship. Destroy aerialships to gain enough energy to meet any possible challenges ahead.

name: S4Game
description: S4Game aims to provide health professionals with an innovative approach to acquire soft skills to foster their professional development. Their main learning objective is the acquisition of soft skills required during work in an operating room, such as communication or teamwork.

name: Rock Paper Smash
description: Rock Paper SMASH is a platform fighter where the only attacks are Rock, Paper, and Scissors. Choose from an iconic cast of characters such as Fridge, Car, Fox, and more!

name: Re-Spawn Tournament
description: Re-Spawn Tournament is a competitive, arena-style multi-player first person shooter game with fast-paced, high energy combat that requires both reflexive skill and tactical thinking.

name: Writhe
description: I feel the writhing. I hear her call.

name: Veins
description: A malignancy spreads through her veins.

name: Sofia the First
description: Let your child help Princess Sofia get to class with this VTech InnoTab Sofia the First game, which includes learning games and creative activities to help him or her learn about colors, shapes, patterns, counting and problem solving.

name: Bluebird of Happiness
description: Bluebird of Happiness is a weird and spooky adventure puzzle game you can complete within an hour.

name: Squirrel with a Gun
description:
Squirrel with a Gun is a sandbox game that focuses on exploration and shooting combat.
Defend yourself from random encounters with Agents using various weapons. Deflect their melee attacks with exceptional timing to disarm them.
Climb and jump across platforms with your natural squirrel skill. Use weapon recoil to cross even greater gaps. Explore the neighbourhood from a squirrel's eye view.
Talk with residents of the neighbourhood and help them out for goodies. Or mug them for goodies.

name: Mission Against Terror 2
description: Mission Against Terror 2 offers what none other MMOFPS has to offer and on top of that, its casual! Customize your avatar and battle with it in style. There are hundreds of different costumes to choose from, along with different accessories to enhance your looks. The only limit is your imagination!

name: Sunkenland
description: A Waterworld themed survival game. Explore sunken cities, build your base, craft items, trade and fight pirates as you struggle to survive on an aquatic post-apocalypse world plagued by hunger and violence.

name: Bob the Goose
description: Bob the Goose is an old school FPS with roguelike elements. It's about a goose searching for his human friend who was kidnaped by lame Old People.

name: Lust Trip
description: The day of your planned road trip has finally arrived, and you are almost ready to drive off. Suddenly, an unexpected person joins your trip, so now you have to travel with her.

name: Fell from another world
description: Fell from another world is a visual novel with RPG elements, team recruitement, minigames and exploration. Travel from earth to this strange new world along with Eurys and reveal the secrets behind the head of the kingdom.

name: D.E.V Bloodline
description: D.E.V Bloodline is a Indie Horrorgame You find you self in your Residental Area with nothing but Darkness, can you arrive from the shadows or do you fall victim to them ?!

name: Gamma 19
description: Gamma 19 is an action RPG with beat 'em up battle mechanics. Punch and shoot your way through robots, worms, and creatures from another dimension in this strange new world!

name: Loot, Luck & Levels
description: Luck, Loot & Levels is a roguelike co-op multiplayer dungeon crawler with randomly generated dungeons and MOBA inspired design. Descend into the Dungeon of Depth to uncover valuables lost to the land, hone your delver's skills, and empower yourself with magical ancient artifacts!

name: Heavy Works
description: Build and Destroy with satisfying digging and building mechanics in this openworld physics constuction simulator, borrow cash to buy bigger more powerfull machines and Build more! Freely construct your yard and the world around to build a town from nothing.

name: Brewpub Simulator
description: Quit your day job, open a bar! Brew lagers, stouts and IPAs, and serve patrons at your own brewpub. Decorate the place, create your own brands of beer, and expand into the best joint in town. All of this in a relaxing simulator that values creativity and passion for crafting.

name: Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories
description: "Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories" is a series of co-operative escape-room style puzzle scenarios. Each one is sure to test your wits as you try to overcome the challenges that stand in the way of your escape.

name: Holiday with Gwen
description: Step into the shoes of detective Hank and his sidekick Gwen. This time on a top secret mission in an exotic Mediterranean-like country to uncover an illegal drug trade, but also to use this opportunity to enjoy themselves and perhaps even to savour romantic moments.

name: Highway Rampage
description: Rogue drivers pilot a high-octane run over miles of post-apocalyptic terrain, escaping the ruthless grip of the forces that thirst for their blood. Choose your driver and see if you've got what it takes to make it through wasteland highways, dodging, disarming, and destroying your opposition!

name: Medieval Kingdom Wars: Royal Blood
description: Only those of Royal Blood can undertake the King’s Campaign. Defend your mighty nation from enemies near and far, build your towns and cities into imgrenable bastions and economic powerhouses, and expand your realm by claiming all that is yours by right of your royal blood.

name: Why I was Born
description: "When I noticed, I was born on its own." This is a game that simulates the life of an ordinary man by rolling the ball.

name: Brave survivors
description: Break the besiege of various monsters! Upgrade the weapons, choose your favorite skills. Unique combination with skill and role. A 14 minutes roguelike experience, shoot with fantastic and exciting experience!! Believe yourself and beat the boss!

name: Radio General: Water Rats
description: Take command of the First Canadian Army once again as you fight for the Channel ports and through the flooded polders of the Low Country. Construct bridges to cross canals and call in Air Support to perform aerial recon. Finish the Canadian army's journey through WW2.

name: Pip 2
description: PIP 2 — cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes

name: Sun Shot
description: SUN SHOT - 2547 People have long since left the earth. In the course of constant military operations and endless skirmishes between states, conditions on earth have slipped into unsustainable conditions.

name: Poly Puzzle: Predators
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with predators.

name: Flying Umbrella
description: "Flying Umbrella" - 2d platformer game about a girl who moves in different directions with every gust of wind. Learn to control your body. The bus won't wait long. Collect berries, only carefully flying around traps and wild animals. Everything will work out!

name: Charge Knight: A Duck's Tale
description: In this casual mechanics game, use continuous movement to overcome challenges. The unstoppable knight Dundee must be strategically driven on his journey, defeating enemies, solving puzzles and mechanics while using the scenery to his advantage.

name: Flatcraft
description: An unreleased 1990s edition of the world's most famous block game. Explore this retro sandbox world with familiar mechanics such as crafting, building, and mining.

name: Pinball Girls
description:
"Pinball Girls" is a game combined with pretty girl, pinball and galgame. The story begins with the agreement that “me” signs an alliance with Cyrili to collect the "destiny energy ball" needed together. Along the way, you will transform yourself as variety of gentlemen and appear beside all kinds of 9 girls to help them achieve their wishes.
From now on, "destiny" will be in hand, everything will be changed by you!

name: Primasia: Chapter One
description: The Prime8 Gang arrive on Prime8 island in the first part of their journey. Trading with the other five islands to gain resources for crafting purposes they will learn about the island's history. They will meet new characters to learn other useful information about Primasia and the Land of Humans.

name: PixelJunk: Scrappers Deluxe
description: Clean up the streets of Junktown as a team of robot garbage collectors. Trash your opponents with up to 4 players or go it alone in this beat ‘em up that’s also a clean ‘em up!

name: Police Radar
description: Police officer, where are you? The city is out of control. The world needs your help right now to maintain peace and order on the city streets.

name: Bloody Hell
description: Bloody Hell is a Bullet-Hell Metroidvania about using the blood of demons to your advantage. Fight Epic Bosses, and take revenge on the terrorising demons.

name: Lucky Tlhalerwa: IMS Death Squad
description: IMS Death Squad is A Third-Person Story-Telling Action Shooter. Its Story Takes Place At The Same Time As The Original Super Incursion. SGT David Grimes Tries To Save His Team As Their Commander Has To Kill Them All, As A Requirement To Complete His Transition Into The Enemy Side.

name: Tamakagura: Tales of Turmoil
description: Yuma Nagumo, a young freelance exorcist, struggles between his own ideals and the harsh reality of life around him in this turn-based tactics RPG. As more and more urgent quests pour in, he and his friends protect the land from evil, but a terrible threat rises to stand in their way...

name: Planet Achelous
description: Planet Achelous is a action adventure, free-roaming game.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days
description: The ultimate digital Vanguard experience that includes an original story set in the world of overDress! Compete with players worldwide with "Ranked Fight," play solo casually with "CPU Fight," and enjoy the game and experience the world of Vanguard at your own pace via many other fight modes.

name: Spy Bros.: Pipi & Bibi's DX
description: Those wacky gangsters are up to no good... Dodge them, plant the bombs and flee the building before it blows up!

name: Berlin Maniacs
description: In Berlin Maniacs you take on the role of the young and impressionable Tina in a fictionalized snapshot of West Berlin in the year of 1968, a time when state violence led to radicalization within the student protest movement.

name: Godzilla: Omniverse
description: Play as, and fight against, 40+ monsters and mechas from the Godzilla omniverse.

name: Ghostland Yard
description: Uncover the truth about the Ghostland Yard investigators disappearance in this challenging 2D precision platformer. Travel across the world in more than 250 hand-crafted levels to find your friends!

name: Desktop Dungeons: Rewind
description: Desktop Dungeons: Rewind bestows bites of tactical roguelike action, which will quickly fester into a deep, lingering, and strategic obsession. Bargain with gods, equip your spoon and pick your battles, before retreating into the healing darkness. But beware… there are still many monsters to face!

name: Kaiju Klash
description: Kaiju Klash is a turn-based fighter where you build your own giant monster and fight to climb the ranks of the arena against other perilous, and sometimes wacky, monster combinations. Each monster part offers unique stats and abilities so you can fight how you want!

name: Karin's Digital Adventure
description: The hot fantasy game now - "SW (Sky World)" It is a virtual world just like the real world. There, Kali can play in her ideal form!

name: Exome
description: EXOME is a co-op survival shooter with a focus on exploration, weapon progression and horde AI. Discover what grim mysteries are hidden in this deep forest. Explore and fight for survival, alone or with your friends.

name: Egg Boy
description: " EGG BOY " is a parkour fighting game based on cute cartoon style, including both single and multiplayer modes. Dozens of party levels, hundreds of different types of EGG BOYs to choose from, rich and interesting activity modes to participate in.

name: Phantom Alchemy: Silvia's Dynamic Urban Planning
description: In order to make up for the corruption committed by her father, Silvia had to help the development of the border city as an alchemist. But if she wants to use alchemy, she must convert the spiritual power of residents into energy.

name: Strike Force Heroes
description: Unravel a deadly mystery, customize your heroes, and save the world in this thrilling remake of the hit flash arena shooter.

name: Blinnk and the Vacuum of Space
description: Welcome to deep space station Norpopolis – where a batch of escaped critters are causing chaos! Grab your Vacuumizer 5000 and go undercover with BLINNK the robot to catch them all. An autism-friendly VR adventure!

name: Dreamcharger
description: Rogue-lite game about fights with random bosses and a full-fledged story campaign. Fight, craft, and become more powerful, to solve the main riddle.

name: Public Land Hunter
description: Experience the challenge of hunting public land in this retro hunting sim. Hunt a variety of game using a range of weapons on procedurally generated parcels of land. Scout, set up and shoot.

name: Picot Ether
description: 『ピコエーテル』は新型ウイルスが蔓延した都市を救う薬剤調合シミュレーションゲームです。 プレイヤーは『Ｒ－ＢＯＷウイルス』が蔓延した都市の診療所医師となり、抗ウイルス薬の開発に勤しみます。

name: Summer: Life in the Countryside - Outing
description:
Additional elements:
・Outdoor map is added.
・Fast travel is added.
・Outing events "Camping", "Swimming", and "Summer Festival" are added.
・One ending is added.

name: Caribbean Marque
description: Sail the open seas of the Caribbean in this light RPG game and experience the thrill of hunting down pirates or being a pirate! Along the way discover a cast of characters good and evil. Upgrade your crew and ship to become the most infamous pirate or maybe resist the temptation.

name: Pixxxel
description: Pixxxel is a game where you can immerse yourself in the colorful world of platform games, but far from simple ones.

name: Curvature
description: Take control of a highly adaptable battle machine and infiltrate a hostile civilization to keep peace in the universe. Build your own playstyle with a vast amount of gadgets, weapons and unique abilities. Survive and dominate a harsh and atmospheric world.

name: Stuff Enuff
description: A competitive party game designed to ruin friendships!

name: Escape!!!
description: Escape is a single player horror game that challenges players to find their way through each maze, collecting items to escape, and avoiding creatures of the night. Any turn may be the wrong one.

name: Friendly Blonding
description: Friendly Blonding is a linear adult visual novel focused on the themes of netorare (or cheating) and moral degeneration (or corruption). It it a short story told from both the male protagonist's and his girlfriend's perspective.

name: Millennium Conflict
description: Millennium Conflict: a real-time strategy game set in space where you must act fast to stop attackers from conquering your universe. With 40 levels, weapon upgrades, and new generals to recruit, it's up to you as the only surviving male to lead your troops to victory.

name: Idle Zombies Clicker
description: Idle clicker game with cute zombies!

name: Furry Feet: Femboys!
description:
Femboy Furry Feet!!!
- Enjoy 8 brand new levels featuring femboy characters!
- Revisit every level art in the gallery.

name: Synthalaxy
description: Synthalaxy is a top-down tactical shooter where the enemies have a series of weak points rather than traditional health. Manipulate enemies in order to complete complex puzzles. Traverse worlds, take aim, and solve puzzles to save the Synthalaxy!

name: Milosc
description: miłość is a minimalist black & white framed game about friendship, love, self-exploration and existentialism. miłość is a unique blend of visual novels, JRPG’s and platforming beauty.

name: Grapple Glide
description: Grapple Glide revolves around momentum based swinging and gliding to complete courses set in a variety of themed worlds. Master the grappling hook and glider to reach the goal as fast as you can!

name: Cursed 3
description: The epic conclusion of the CURSED trilogy.

name: Temple of Horror
description: Escape the dangerous beings lurking in the dark, dodge countless deadly traps and slowly unruffle the secret of the Temple of Horror while not just trying to survive but to find your way out of this hell. Are you ready?

name: Spike Mtn
description: Use your grappling hook to overcome challenging obstacles and reach the top of Spike Mtn! Spike Mtn is a 2D precision platformer with a fun and retro atmosphere.

name: Escape First Alchemist
description: First-person escape game, playable solo, co-op, or pvp with up to 6 people. Solve riddles of a reclusive alchemist that trapped you in his workshop. Brew potions and overcome challenges as he laughs at your failures and makes light of your successes...But what if things are not what they seem?

name: Tales of Tarium: Awakening from the Ashes
description: Explore this dark medieval world while fighting mythological creatures. Throughout betrayal, nervous battles and hidden truths decide whether to defend the honor of high members of the church, help a rebellious group of cultists or embrace on a quest to reveal the secrets of this land.

name: Pipes Puzzles
description: Pipes Puzzles is a casual puzzle game.

name: Goat's Tale 2
description: The Goat is back in his next adventure! The challenge will be difficult, but only with your help he will be able to get to the top.

name: Blinded by Fear
description: Blinded by Fear is a survival horror experience with a twist. You can't see anything! Navigate a 3D world with a novel lidar based sight mechanic. Solve puzzles, uncover a twisted mystery and confront unseeable horrors dwelling in the darkness. Can you survive when you are Blinded by Fear?

name: Lost Beyond
description: Lost Beyond is a Adventure Exploration game where your main quest becomes finding a way back to your dimension. Embark on a journey, find your way through a vast and mysterious environment and try to hold it together while the Universe tests your worthiness.

name: Photogenic Minds: Identity
description: "デッキ構築型３D探索サイコホラー"。 PM0:00からAM0:00までの12時間を支配し、無限ループを抜けて死者の魂を捕獲して下さい。 使えるのはたった1つのカメラだけ。

name: Forbidden myths
description: Role-playing game with action elements in the world of Slavic mythology. Go from a simple ordinary fighter to one of the most famous people in the principality, fighting hard and unusual monsters and solving the problems of fabulous creatures.

name: Cube Adventure
description: This minimalist game will help you pass the evening.

name: Spooky Mansion Manager
description: Spooky Mansion Manager is a turn-based management game where you create Spooky Tours in a mansion you inherited from your grandpa. Ultimate goal is to acquire a hundred gold bars in as many weeks to pay back a loan. NOTE: This is not a scary game (ie. it doesn't have any jump scares etc.)

name: Pussy 6
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Chug the Tiny Tugboat
description: Use reading skills to help Chug the Tugboat keep the bathtub shipshape!

name: Lost but Lucid
description: Lost but Lucid is a platformer set in the dreamscapes of a patient undergoing experimental therapy. Traverse 27 levels seeking secrets and collectables. Sprint, leap, fall, delve, and climb your way out of an unconscious prison.

name: Fishing Game
description: Fishing game is an itty bitty game inspired by the fishing minigame in Stardew Valley. Filled with a bunch of goofy writing and a handful of spicy gimmicks. Collect over twenty unique fish and add them to your compendium as you navigate through a world of quirky characters and strange locations!

name: Totsugeki! Mix
description: Totsugeki! Mix is a cute action platform game. Choosing one of the three girls, each with their own unique weapon, the player must travel through ten different stages fighting Galuf's unreasonably cute army. There are several different special magic powers that can be collected, including a fairy familiar, magic shield, and time slow, and a boss waits at the end of each stage.

name: Buzz! Quem é o Génio Português?
description: Buzz!: Quem é o Génio Português? is an electronic game for PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3 and PSP. This game from the Buzz! series is localized into Portuguese from Portugal and focuses on questions about Portuguese and international history, television, music, and society.

name: Neo Geo Mini International
description: An official SNK emulation system that came with 40 SNK games in the form of a miniature MVS system. Games output at 720p on the built-in screen, and can also be output to a TV through min-HDMI.

name: Bloody Hell Hotel
description: In Bloody Hell Hotel, you embody a vampire. You wake up from a coma that has lasted for centuries, only to find your once-grand estate is now in ruins. It's time to turn it into a prosperous hotel! It's no easy task, though, as times are tough and resources are scarce. There are shortages of food, supplies, and workforce. Being a blood-thirsty monster doesn't help with customer satisfaction either. Luckily, underneath the estate lies a crypt and a system of caves. By foraging, farming, crafting, and fighting your way through the monster-infested dungeons, you'll find the resources you need to restore greatness to your mansion and turn it into a thriving hotel business.

name: Golden Rails: World's Fair
description: The mayor of your hometown needs your help constructing a world's fair! Continue conquering the Wild West with your favorite characters Jack and Jill. Complete 60 exciting levels and help rid the city of insidious bandits and build the most grandiose exhibition in the world!

name: Verlet Ascend
description: Verlet Ascend is a physics based, action platformer with roguelike mechanics, a fully destructable procedurally generated environment, and rope swing physics. Fight creatures, loot enemies, upgrade your character, and climb your way up in an endless parkour.

name: MultiVersus: Season 1
description: Season 1 contains a new battle pass, along with new cosmetics, modes, and characters including Rick, Morty, Black Adam, and Stripe.

name: Thymesia: Cloud Version
description: Thymesia is a grueling action-RPG with fast-paced combat and an intricate plague weapon system. In a kingdom where death spreads, play as a mysterious character known by the code name "Corvus". Prey upon your enemies, wield the power of disease and find the truth in your own memories.

name: 1112: Episode 02
description: In 1112 Episode 02, players continue the journey with Louis Everett, who now finds himself in New York under mysterious circumstances. This sequel amplifies the intrigue as players help Louis unravel the reasons behind his unexpected arrival in the bustling city. Promising unforeseen twists and encounters, the game offers hours of engaging gameplay. This episode elevates the experience with an all-new advanced graphical design and artistic direction, featuring 25 expansive and detailed environments. Players will meet 14 new characters, each adding to the rich tapestry of the story. The game's diverse puzzles, each with unique gameplay mechanics, challenge and engage players at every turn. Complemented by an original score, this installment of 1112 maintains its elaborate interactive narrative, immersing players deeper into Louis's increasingly complex world.

name: Cardterrupters
description: Turns not guaranteed in a roguelite deckbuilder where you can cancel the enemy's turns!

name: 1112: Episode 03
description: In 1112 Episode 03, the enigmatic saga of Louis Everett continues as he mysteriously returns to Jalonsville via an enigmatic passageway. This installment deepens the intrigue, with Louis teetering on the brink of madness. Players are tasked with helping him cling to reality amidst escalating mysteries. This episode surpasses its predecessors in content, promising to keep players engrossed for hours with its complex storyline. The visual experience in this episode reaches new heights, with 39 stunningly realistic new backgrounds and 14 new characters enriching the narrative. The gameplay is enhanced with a variety of unique puzzles, each contributing to the unfolding mystery. The fluid and dynamic interfaces make for an engaging experience, complemented by original, captivating music. With a storyline more immersive and extensive than the first two episodes combined, 1112 Episode 03 offers a rich, spellbinding adventure that challenges both the mind and imagination.

name: Les Visiteurs: Le Jeu
description: In order to avenge her grandmother, the little little daughter of the witch of Malcombe has thrown a lot of trouble in the castle of Montmirail by scattering a number of objects from our time. The Inquisition thinks that Godefroy de Montmirail is a heretic and hunts him down. "Calamitas!" Stuck in our time. Godefroy and his faithful squire Jacquouille need your help: return to the castle of Montmirail, retrieve the anachronistic objects to restore order in The Halls of Time. Play as the descendants of the Montmirails: the fate of your family is in your hands. The task will not be easy and you will have to thwart many riddles to explore the castle from top to bottom.

name: Syndicate
description:
The Sega Mega Drive/Genesis and Sega CD port of Syndicate features much more cartoony styled graphics, different control set and completely new levels.

The Sega CD version has a different soundtrack which is the only difference between the two.

name: Syndicate
description: The Super Nintendo/Famicom port of Syndicate has a more cartoony graphics style, different control set, and completely new levels.

name: Poker Soul
description: Poker Soul is a Texas Hold'em game with lovely ACG characters.

name: A New Kaizo Era
description: A New Kaizo Era is a kaizo mod for New Super Mario Bros. Wii.

name: Waifu Wars
description:
In a world of love and war, there can only be one ultimate waifu. Players from all over the world compete against each other in order to prove who is the best.

You will take control of your own waifu and fight against others in order to become the ultimate champion. With many different classes to choose from, each with their own unique abilities and weapons, you will need to be strategic in order to win.

Can you lead your waifu to victory?

name: Nomori
description: Nomori is a mind-bending puzzle game where you need to control time and space to journey through a shattered spirit world. Take shortcuts through portals, rotate your perspective, and control the flow of time to move forward, whichever way that is.

name: Infinity Ball
description:
Why continue flapping birds when you can have Infinity?

Infinity Ball is an incredibly addicting and fast paced game which won't give your finger a rest!!

Just move the ball left and right and don't let those pesky lines touch you!! And Infinity will be at your reach!!

Get the highest score you can, but be careful, there is always someone better than you!!!

Your amazing gameplays are automatically recorded at a silky smooth 60fps. You can even share them with other people and make everyone jealous on your score!!

name: Coffee Break: A sip away from doom
description: In a tedious day, Oliver finishes his best invention yet: A SubAtomic coffee machine that is to make the perfect coffee. But a problem emerged when the perfect coffee was so good it blew up the machine and ruptured timespace. Now, Oliver has to retrieve the pieces of his machine that are scattered through the multiverse. Follow Oliver in his adventure through the dimensions in search of the perfect coffee! Meet various worlds with incredible art, charismatic characters and challenging puzzles!

name: Cold Front
description: Cold Front is a short 2.5D RPG Maker horror/narrative-driven game with visual novel/adventure elements following the story of two childhood friends, Augustine and Winnie, suddenly being trapped in a freezing blizzard even though it's the summer. The two have to work together to escape the chilling dangers they are suddenly forced into.

name: Sunday Lawd Reel 1
description:
Cranking SLOW at times is the key to playing this game...as it plays out as an old film, you can change the reels by slowing down cranks until a different outcome happens! It took lots of work to make, and I learned about the playdate image process....

FIXED crashing bug in reel1a..

name: Three Fourths Home: Extended Edition - Deluxe
description:
Three Fourths Home is a visual short story in which you assume the role of Kelly during her drive through the storm. In the 20 miles between her grandparents' crumbling barn and her parents' home, she receives a phone call from her mother. While driving through a stylized representation of rural Nebraska, you must navigate an extended conversation between Kelly and her parents and younger brother.

Three Fourths Home takes a look into a specific moment of these characters' lives and their relationships with one another. The narrative touches on a variety of issues affecting Kelly and her family, including disability, adulthood, and familial obligation.

As a visual short story, dialogue choice is the primary focus of Three Fourths Home.
Between the main game and the epilogue, nearly 800 unique dialogue choices shade the story differently based on how you play. In addition to dialogue choice, you must also keep driving in order to keep the conversation going. Stop, and time slows to a crawl. Kelly has to move forward in order to get home.

Three Fourths Home: Extended Edition includes an expanded edit of the initial release as well as several new elements, including a new epilogue in addition to a number of extra features.

name: Mad Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse - GT Pack 1
description: Extend your experience in the unique universe of Dragon Ball Xenoverse with this DLC GT Pack 1.

name: I'm in Love With Your Dead Grandmother
description: Sin descripción

name: The Golden Age
description: Sin descripción

name: Nump Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: Pathogen
description: Pathogen's simple-yet-addictive gameplay is augmented by a terrific presentation, with visuals that make it feel like you're playing on a computer from a 1980s sci-fi film.

name: Zombie Escape: The Driving Dead
description:
Daniel, a young soldier, and his girl friend Annie, a pretty dancer, are peacefully living in city N. One day, after Annie went to city B for a play by invitation, everything changed…
Daniel woke up, finding himself in the Hospital morgue. He tried to recall something, but it is hard. Daniel couldn’t recall anything else, except that he was sent to the hospital as he collapsed when executing a mission.
People in the hospital all turned into zombies. Daniel had to escape …

name: Projekt Everblood
description: Projekt Everblood is a 2D top-down action game set in an alternate World War 2. Embrace your vampiric abilities of flight, feeding and deadly fury to exact revenge on the enemy scientists that wronged you.

name: Magic Kingdom
description: Magic Kingdom - This is a 3D puzzle treasure adventure from a first-person perspective. You have to take on the role of an ordinary citizen in a small magical kingdom that lives in peace and prosperity and flourishes every year.

name: The Lost Abyss
description: In the previously flourishing world, darkness has come. Warriors who fought for order and justice are now forced to fight for survival. The world is not the same as before, hunger and disease conquered civilians.

name: Surprise Cat
description: Surprise Cat is a hidden object game with puzzles. Unleash your inner feline with original gravity-defying gameplay and mind-bending puzzles. Search for hidden objects and use them to defeat your enemies!

name: Nintendo Classic Mini: Super Famicom
description: Sin descripción

name: The Great Dick Invasion
description: After a series of apocalyptic climate events, Earth is now under attack by a legion of penis shaped aliens who seek to wipeout what remains of the human race. Defend what is left of mankind's most iconic landmarks in this fast-paced crazy Tower Defense game.

name: Solve This! Emoji Puzzle
description: Solve logic puzzles in this challenging brain teaser game, collect rewards and unlock different themes. Play through a lot of different levels with rising difficulty.

name: Nintendo Classic Mini: Family Computer
description: Nintendo Classic Mini: Family Computer is the Japanese version of the mini console known as NES Classic Edition. It has some different games built-in when comparing with the international version.

name: Escape from Frankenstein's Castle
description: Injured in a car crash with her fiancé Horatio, Hannah wakes up alone and finds herself trapped in Dr. Frankenstein’s castle. Horatio’s missing, and with guidance from a resident ghost, Isabella, Hannah quickly realizes Dr. Frankenstein is conducting strange experiments that put both her and Horatio in grave danger. Help Hannah as she interacts with the castle’s suspicious inhabitants, discovers clues about the doctor’s master plan, and completes puzzles to find a way out!

name: Nintendo Classic Mini: Family Computer - Weekly Shonen Jump 50th Anniversary Version
description: A special edition of the Nintendo Classic Mini with games from Shonen Jump franchises.

name: Captain Tsubasa
description:
Captain Tsubasa is the first game based on Captain Tsubasa. It was released in 1988-04-28 by Tecmo for the Japanese market.
This game is the first of the Tecmo game series. This videogame defined a unique concept: a sports RPG/Strategy and cinema action game. It follows the same story from the Captain Tsubasa (1983 TV series).

name: Sakura X Clash: Last Millennial Spring
description:
Sakura X Clash: Last Millenial Spring is an IKEMEN-based fighting game, that pays homage to arcade classics such as The King of Fighters and Street Fighter.
sXc also uses NGPC-styled graphics and aesthetic, aiming for a simple yet deep gameplay experience, making the game easy to pickup and play for begginers, but with a lot of depth for those who want to master it.
Featuring a (quite literally) colorful and constantly expanding cast of characters, each with its on gameplay style and unique quirks.

name: Echo Night: The First Voyage
description: Echo Night: The First Voyage is a fairly unknown piece of the echo night series of games that was released inside the adventure player for PSP back in 2005

name: Nova Antarctica
description: Survive Earth's harshest conditions on a devastatingly beautiful journey shaped by the choices you make, the paths you take, and the stories you weave with the mysterious animals of Antarctica.

name: Autocrusher: Bumper Cars
description: Auto Crusher: Bumper Cars is a car destruction racing game inspired by the bumper car rides from amusement arcades and carnivals. In this game players will feel the excitement of crashing into other vehicles, coupled with the use of several power ups and upgrades , making this game a race for glory!

name: Little Nemo the Clown
description: Little Nemo The Clown is a 2D Open World game inspired by good Metroidvania titles. Talk, Run, Fly, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Fantasy World full of Magic and Color. Little Nemo is a modern Maze Runner Adventure. Can you find the Clown before your Time runs out?

name: Purple Fantasy
description: "Purple Fantasy" is a super free anime puzzle game! You can experience it by making the level you want~

name: Godsworn
description: Godsworn is a classic mythological RTS. Experience an epic fantasy retelling of the northern crusades, where pagan gods and their tribes clash against crusaders and armies of heaven. Choose a divine hero, rally worshippers alongside mythical creatures, and smite the unworthy!

name: Cube Fight
description: Cube Fight is a simple 2D shooter game that you can play and chill out with your friends. Here you can find abilities that will randomly spawn across the map and velocity-based player movement giving you a dynamic gameplay experience. What are you waiting for? Download the game and check it out by yourself!

name: Atic Atac
description:
From Atic dark to Cellar dank, in Caverns deep and swampland rank. The garden green spawms hideous life, the outhouse treasure leads to strife Awake...awake...and find the key! For only then wilt thou be free!
This is a brand new Atic Atac remake written from scratch following the demise of JMD's version. Gameplay wise, it's very close to the original, but with a few extra bells, whistles and that sort of thing. Graphics, sound and music have been enhanced in true remakes fashion.

name: Covert Front
description: The Covert Front Series is a series of games by Mateusz Skutnik and Karol Konwerski.

name: Videoverse
description: Take a trip back to the days of the early internet and fan forums, when the video game console "Kinmoku Shark" and its online social network "Videoverse" were still popular...

name: Luna Abyss
description: Luna Abyss is a narrative-driven, first-person action-adventure game. Discover a vast, derelict colony; deep within the belly of an ominous mimic moon. Fight twisted cosmic horrors in intense, fast-paced, bullet-hell combat.

name: Delta Dash
description:
Delta Dash is a rhythm game in active development,

2 Lines, 4 keys, keep the rhythm !

name: Mithraeum
description: Mithraeum is a blockchain game that combines elements of Grand Strategy and MMO. Fight other players, forge alliances, intrigue and betray. Friend of foe - it's your choice.

name: Naious
description: Naious is a horizontally scrolling shoot-em-up. The gameplay is fairly traditional and involves navigating outdoor and indoor stages (often with narrow spaces), destroying mobile and stationary enemies on the way. The fighter craft starts with a vulcan gun and can later change to wide shot, laser, and homing missiles. Rather infrequent power-ups appear at set points on the stages and change or enhance the plane's weapons.

name: Gli Animotosi e la Macchina Motante
description: Sin descripción

name: Zero Ops
description: A classic 3rd Person Mobile Shooter. Gone are the days of "run and gun". This game rewards those who rely on tactics, teamwork, and stealth. Join up with your teammates in this 5v5 intense mobile shooter.

name: Reliquary
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Fighter Alpha 3: Xiang Long
description: A mod that changes the property of a lot of moves such as reversals and projectiles, making them resemble the xiang long hack from Street Fighter 2.

name: The Button Be
description: Sin descripción

name: Breaking Enigma
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball: Our Church and Halloween RPG - Machine #3
description: Sin descripción

name: Softball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 4 Player Cooperation Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Missing
description: A short VN style game made in RPG Maker in which you try to find out what happened to your missing friend.

name: Sumikkogurashi the Movie Block Puzzle Game
description: A kawaii and gentle block puzzle game with no timers or countdown. Earn points towards downloadable backgrounds.

name: Snail Bob
description: Snail Bob was resting peacefully at home, but suddenly the builders arrived and threw him away. Help him deal with them! Guide the snail through the level using levers and buttons to activate various mechanisms. You are waiting for many levels full of dangers and tricky puzzles. You will have to test your logic and resourcefulness in order to find the right path.

name: Snail Bob 2
description: Bob is back for another adventure. Guide him through an epic journey to his grandpa!

name: Snail Bob 3: Egypt Journey
description: Bob is back for another adventure and this time got stuck in Egypt.

name: My Hero Ultra Rumble
description: Pick your favorite character, team up and fight to be the last ones standing in the new 24-player Battle Royale free to play game "My Hero Ultra Rumble"!

name: Repentless
description:
You are the imprisoned dictator. People of your country come visit. Survive as long as you can.

- From the testimonies of your visitors, discover the pillars of dictatorship.
- Explore how different layers of society suffer from authoritarianism and kleptocracy.

name: BountyHeart
description:
BountyHeart is a mobile roguelite puzzle RPG that combines Match 3 with Tactics. You play as Tobi, a criminal who has been sent to the island of BountyHeart, fabled to contain the Legendary Bounty. The only ticket to freedom is to capture the Legendary Bounty!
Assemble the perfect crew by befriending those you meet along the way, or defeat them for their bounty and strengthen your party.

name: Urban Trial Pocket
description:
Grab your bike and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fun, fast-paced gameplay, colorful visuals, and smooth controls.
Choose you bike to fit your style, either easy to handle to do impressive tricks or powerful to beat the clock. Do tricks with the tips of your fingers, with figures that have been made ultra accessible and controls adapted to touch screens.

name: Pixel Pro Tennis
description:
Pixel Pro Tennis is a unique and addicting arcade tennis game, that combines realistic gesture controls with authentic physics and beautiful pixel-art.
Use the unique and simple touch controls to hit everything from a lob, to a slice, to a gloriously satisfying top-spin winner.

name: Hidden Object: Missing Violins! - Premium
description: You have to help Giuseppe Stradivarius to find the stolen violins! The violins were made by the great master of stringed instruments. You also need to find the unique stand made from selected Tyrolean wood of long exposure. You have to solve a lot of intricate puzzles and overcome tricky obstacles before you find out who the thief is. During the investigation, look for hidden objects by lists, silhouettes and play mini - games.

name: Slime Smasher EX
description:
It's a casual and simple game for everyone! Just TAP and use the super magic to easily SMASH the uncontrolled Slime Army!
It was created within the concept of bubble wraps, whether for the addictive enjoyment or to purely relieve stress.If you love to pop bubble wraps, this is the game suitable for you!

name: Paskal's Path
description:
You are Paskal a tiny and bustling chameleon who aims to liberate his girlfriend from the hands of a colorless witch.
This witch sure knows how to run and hide!
She is pulling you through very challenging paths to keep you out of her way... Will she make it?

name: Kids Cars
description: Like to play with cars and trucks? Kids CARS app is like playing with real cars – it starts your own created story – you need to imagine where and why you are going.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Deluxe Edition
description: Dakar Desert Rally is the biggest off-road rally racing adventure ever developed. Experience the speed and excitement of the largest rally race on the planet, featuring a wide variety of licensed vehicles from motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SSVs.

name: Lighthouse Keeper
description: You are tasked with taking care of the old Lighthouse in a small island. Repair it's broken parts, hunt for food to get by, gather materials to craft stuff to help you along your journey.

name: Outbreak Island: Pendulum
description: Mysterious island, crashed plane, underground complex, classified military research. Survive in a new atmospheric sandbox thriller and uncover the terrible secret of the disaster.

name: Endgame: Survival
description: Big group of people will be dropped into a deserted island where they will have to survive.

name: Heist Master
description: Get all the loot and become the ultimate heist master!

name: Tend
description: To take over the planet, protect the Nexus from the crowding monsters. Set up towers and upgrade them to eliminate the crowding monsters.

name: Dead Pets Unleashed
description: Struggling punk band, Dead Pets, are still looking for their breakthrough after almost 10 years. Gordy has big plans for the group, but when you turn 30, life starts to get in the way. Dead Pets Unleashed is a narrative, slice of life and management-lite game; get ready to unleash your inner demon.

name: Star Trust
description: Fly with your spaceship, avoid obstacles and destroy monsters and powerful bosses. In this game you can shot with laser, missiles and powerful unique specials power of 9 different spaceships. In addition, those space ships have good mobility that you can use to avoid enemy attacks.

name: Hear Your Path
description: Hear Your Path is a maze game where, in order to find the exit, the player needs to listen and play each note of the proposed music. However, the notes and the exit are hidden, like Minesweeper, so be careful when listening to a note, because It may not be the right one to give sequence to the music

name: Smash Boats: Waterlogged Edition
description: LET'S GO SMASH! Bash, crash and smash through schools of enemies and horrendous hazards to collect star to become the ULTIMATE SMASHER!

name: Droid Trivia
description: Droid Trivia is fun for everyone! Challenge your friends or family to over 800 questions spread over 15 categories! Go head to head in local couch multiplayer or play against the AI. Choose to Play 4 or 8 rounds or just the individual rounds you like.

description:
Fps games and multiplayer shooting games are your favorite genres? What can be better than the classical realistic one? The shooter that comes with a mix of your favorite multiplayer games features and new!
Meet new shooting game with a capital S - Battle Forces! Let's dive into the world of fps shooter!

name: Captor Clash
description:
Captor Clash: Unleash your power in the ultimate captor showdown!
Choose your team from a diverse set of heroes, each with their own unique fighting styles and abilities, and build the perfect team builder to take on the competition in fast-paced 1v1 battles.
Test your skills in challenging PVE modes like Raids and Abyss Maze to earn rewards and level up your role play experience.
With intuitive controls and stunning graphics, Captor Clash is the perfect fight game for players who crave a thrilling combo of strategy and action.
Whether you prefer 1v1 battles or 3v3 team fights, Captor Clash offers a variety of gameplay modes to keep you engaged.
Join the ultimate combat fight and face off against players from around the world in Captor Clash.
